page.title: 15FLEET CARNIVAL IMPRESSIONS
page.content: The floats{(decorated lorries)}were ready and the atmosphere was very exciting. At 7pm the procession started. It began with a fire-engine, some police motor-bikes with flashing lights and a steamroller. The{theme} this year was music, and many floats illustrated musicals such as{Thriller, {Starlight Express, Fame and The Wizard {of Oz.} Hats, badges, leaflets, balloons, stickers and sweets were given out and money was collected for charities such as{Cancer Research}and{RSPCA.}There were troops of majorettes and bands such as the{Gurkhas.}The Carnival Queen was Tracey Anderson and the Princess was Emma Robson. Everyone was laughing by the time the Carnival ended at 9pm because they had all enjoyed themselves. All the hard work that had gone into it, was worthwhile.
